CustomField.formula:
CASE(Stage__c, "Contact Made", IMAGE("/resource/Light_Green", "Contact Made", 30, 30) & " Contact Made",
"Information Verified", IMAGE("/resource/Green", "Information Verified", 30, 30) & " Information Verified",
"Contract Bid Package Sent", IMAGE("/resource/Hard_Yellow", "Contract Bid Package Sent", 30, 30) & " Contract Bid Package Sent",
"Client Showed Interest", IMAGE("/resource/Biryuza", "Client Showed Interest", 30, 30) & " Client Showed Interest",
"Need Contact Verification", IMAGE("/resource/Red", "Need Contact Verification", 30, 30) & " Need Contact Verification",
"Contact Verified", IMAGE("/resource/Emerald_Green", "Contact Verified", 30, 30) & " Contact Verified",
"Contract Sent Via Docusign", IMAGE("/resource/Purple", "Contract Sent Via Docusign", 30, 30) & " Contract Sent Via Docusign",
"Proposal/Review", IMAGE("/resource/Dark_Purple", "Contract Under Review", 30, 30) & " Contract Under Review",
"First Follow Up", IMAGE("/resource/Light_Grey", "First Follow Up", 30, 30) & " First Follow Up",
"Second Follow Up", IMAGE("/resource/Blue", "Second Follow Up", 30, 30) & " Second Follow Up",
"Third Follow Up", IMAGE("/resource/Hard_Blue", "Third Follow Up", 30, 30) & " Third Follow Up",
"Negotiations Started", IMAGE("/resource/Red_Orange", "Negotiations Started", 30, 30) & " Negotiations Started",
"Closed - WON", IMAGE("/resource/Green", "Closed – WON", 30, 30) & " Closed – WON",
"Closed - LOST", IMAGE("/resource/Red", "Closed – LOST", 30, 30) & " Closed – LOST",
"" )
CustomField.label: Colored Stage
